body:
## Bug Report

In https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/4689, it turns debuginfo completely off for the dev, test, and bench profiles. But we set `[profile.test] debug=1` to keep the line information for tests. 

When I running a test, the backtrace shows without line number for codes of `libtikv`, see https://internal.pingcap.net/idc-jenkins/blue/rest/organizations/jenkins/pipelines/tikv_ghpr_test/runs/6483/nodes/110/steps/660/log/?start=0
```
 10:     0x55ea2bb7b202 - core::result::unwrap_failed::hf29614f40702c601
  11:     0x55ea2bbe04dc - core::result::Result<T,E>::unwrap::h2860fd56f6b605d4
  12:     0x55ea2a5291e7 - tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::batch::BatchSystem<N,C>::shutdown::h1b0a5ecdcf7dc7c1
  13:     0x55ea2abcb5e8 - tikv::raftstore::store::fsm::store::RaftBatchSystem::shutdown::h0a5eed9d8a5f9227
  14:     0x55ea29eecd12 - tikv::server::node::Node<C>::stop_store::h81766c31dce70bfb
  15:     0x55ea29ef395d - tikv::server::node::Node<C>::stop::ha0bec93fd452b2e0
  16:     0x55ea29fa390f - <test_raftstore::node::NodeCluster as test_raftstore::cluster::Simulator>::stop_node::h776f806e9624f6fd
  17:     0x55ea29c0c934 - test_raftstore::cluster::Cluster<T>::stop_node::h2b6c255358df1246
                               at /home/jenkins/tikv-master/build/components/test_raftstore/src/cluster.rs:215
  18:     0x55ea29c0c356 - test_raftstore::cluster::Cluster<T>::shutdown::hfed4a9d244b48252
                               at /home/jenkins/tikv-master/build/components/test_raftstore/src/cluster.rs:523
  19:     0x55ea29c0d006 - <test_raftstore::cluster::Cluster<T> as core::ops::drop::Drop>::drop::h2ab1b063808ba94f
                               at /home/jenkins/tikv-master/build/components/test_raftstore/src/cluster.rs:1019
  20:     0x55ea29b7fd71 - core::ptr::real_drop_in_place::h56b2740450cdc9cd
                               at /rustc/0e4a56b4b04ea98bb16caada30cb2418dd06e250/src/libcore/ptr/mod.rs:197
  21:     0x55ea29c246a0 - failpoints::cases::test_merge::test_node_merge_restart::ha69b069534ce5292
                               at tests/failpoints/cases/test_merge.rs:207
  22:     0x55ea29c1523a - failpoints::cases::test_merge::test_node_merge_restart::{{closure}}::h94951c415f767192
                               at tests/failpoints/cases/test_merge.rs:111
```
It does show line number for codes of `failpoint_test`, but the line number for codes of `libtikv` is missing. When I set `[profile.dev] debug=1`, everything works as expected.
title: Line number isn't displayed in backtrace for tests
